about.title: About
about.empoweringNeuroscientists: Empowering Arab neuroscientists to shape the future of brain science
about.aboutText: We are a community of Arab speakers interested in Neuroscience, cognitive science, and psychiatry. Aimed for aspiring Arab neuroscientists to connect, collaborate, and contribute. We aim to engage Arabic-speaking neuroscientists in hands-on experience to kick start their careers.

contact.embarkJourney: Embark on a journey through the intricacies of the mind with us.
contact.virtualDoorsOpen: Whether you have questions, seek guidance, or simply want to delve deeper into the fascinating world of neuroscience tutorials, our virtual doors are always open.
contact.exploreWonders: Connect with us and let the exploration of the brain's wonders begin.
contact.sharedCuriosity: Your inquiries are the sparks that fuel our shared curiosity.

footer.shapingFutureNeuroscience: Shaping the future of Neuroscience in the Arab world!
